abstract: Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, who has been sentenced to death in 2013 Boston Marathon bombings, is moved to Supermax prison in Florence, Colo.
lead_paragraph: Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, who was convicted of murder for the Boston Marathon bombings, is now detained in ADX Florence, the prison known as Supermax.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Marathon Bomber Moved to Highest-Security Prison
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Marathon Bomber Moved to Highest-Security Prison

snippet: Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, who was convicted of murder for the Boston Marathon bombings, is now detained in ADX Florence, the prison known as Supermax.
